title: 2025 Greek presidential election - Wikipedia
snippet: A third round of voting was held on 6 February 2025, where no candidate reached the reduced required majority of 180. The fourth round was held on 12 February 2025, where Konstantinos Tasoulas was elected as President of Greece.

title: Presidential Election 2025 Greece
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas (New Democracy, ND) won the Greek presidential election in the 4th round of voting on 12 February with 160 votes. He beat Tassos Giannitsis (Panhellenic Socialist Movement-Movement for Change, PASOK-KINAL) who obtained 34 votes.

title: A veteran conservative lawmaker is sworn in as Greece’s new president | AP News
snippet: Greece’s new President Constantine Tassoulas, right, takes an oath next to Archbishop of Athens and All Greece Ieronimos during the swearing in ceremony at the Parliament, in Athens, Greece, Thursday, March 13, 2025.

title: Greece elects former parliament speaker as new president | Reuters
snippet: [1/4]Greek prime minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis and his party's lawmakers applaud after the conclusive vote for the Greek president, at the Greek parliament in Athens, Greece, February 12, 2025.

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas sworn in as Greece’s new president | eKathimerini.com
snippet: Newsroom March 13, 2025 13.03.2025 • 12:05 · Former Parliament speaker Konstantinos Tasoulas became the ninth president of the Hellenic Republic since the fall of the 1967-1974 dictatorship and the abolition of the monarchy, on Thursday.
